it might be because your downloadding to a drive thats not able to have a file over 4gb, i cant rember if thats ntfs or fat32

thanks for upload, please can anyone answer me ! i have 2.0.8955 dashboard , do i have to update it in order to play this game ?, ok if so to which version of dashborad i shall update? , also will i am gona have a trouble or any issue playing old games such BLACK OPS , MODERN WARFARE , any of 2010 games ? please answer & help
if you done the dragon age 2 dash update then you will not be asked to update the dash again for homefront
markkeane what you need to do is format the drive ur downloading to and make it as ntfs
thats what i was saying lol (kind of)
fankoosh, all you have to do is run the iso's for those games through abgx and create a new dvd file then reburn and they play fine ;)

@black_shadow_1981, i still have not done any kind of dashborad update , i still didnt update to dragon age 2 dashborad update , so i still have 2.0.8955 , now i will download& burn homefront & will gona tp play , but will my xbox 360 ask me for dashboard  update?, if so , with this latest update , am i gona be able to play old games as i mentioned b4 , thanx
@zenman76 thanx for ur post , i iwll give it a try & lets see if it needs update or not
you will not be able to play halo reach and black ops and some other cod games but you can repatch them then reburn then and they will work fine, but you will need to make new discs
Well im glad that i didn't buy it. I give it a 3/5. BUT! I have not get tested online.
@markkeane there can be only 2 reasons: the drive u r downloading to is FAT32 or you don't have enough disk space left. make sure you have some extra space remaining thean yr download size.

@black_shadow_1981
when you say "patch", where can i find patches then for Black Ops and Halo Reach so i could only dload patches n not the whole games. thnx :)

@metalprofi666 , all u have to do after i updated my dashbors to latest one (2011) & playing homefront right now , is to run abgx360 GUI programe which will fix blackops buckup iso & patch it , then burn the new fixed & patched iso to new disc , thats all , & this is what abgx done here in the following picture, all ok

make sure you patch it to ssv2 with abgx before playing. you have to manually patch the ss crc and dmi crc manually to get ssv2. go to abgx website and search it under the verified tab, all instructions are there
